titleStmt.title: Letter requesting help. W. W. Hamilton to Eartha M. M. White. January 30, 1930.
titleStmt.author: W. W. Hamilton

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "editing the Earth M.M. White Archive" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

objectDesc.p: Handwritten letter on 5x7 writting tablet paper front and back dated January 30, 1930

body.p:
I am writing to let you hear
from us We are all
up but not so well
but I hope that this not
Will find you well &up
I wrot Mrs. Yourk Price
but cant hear from him
I wrote you also & cant
hear from you. What is
the matter. Is Mr. Price
still in the house or not
Please answer this letter
Please see if you can get
a Renter fro the down stair
of that house.

We put the house in
charge an agentbut
We lost his address so
we cant write him pleas
get his adress off his
rent sign & send it to us.
all sends love to you.
Thomas is no better as
we can see.
Please help us out in
as it so far up there &
money is scare we cant
get up there to see after
it. let us hear from
you at once.
